sentences.sContent: A testator may, in an emergency situation, make a nuncupative will, which shall be witnessed by two or more witnesses.
sentences.sContent_eng: A testator may, in an emergency situation, make a nuncupative will, which shall be witnessed by two or more witnesses.
sentences.sCn: 遗嘱人在危急情况下，可以立口头遗嘱。 口头遗嘱应当有两个以上见证人在场见证。

words.tran: 遗嘱的，据遗嘱的；遗嘱中写明的
[法] 遗嘱；圣约；确实的证明

trans.tranOther: a person who makes a will, esp one who dies testate
